bibl.title: Papyri Graecae Schøyen (PSchøyen II). Essays and Texts in Honour of Martin Schøyen. With an Introduction by James M. ROBINSON. (Manuscripts in the Schøyen Collection. V. Greek Papyri. Volume II = Papyrologica Florentina. XL.)
bibl.note: 1 front. coul., figg. et 22 pll. coul.

P. Schøyen II, 26-34. - Pp. ix: Prefazione (D.M. e R.P.); - xi: Introduction (J.M.R.). - Texts [26: Leviticus; - 27-33: Greek Documents; - 34: Demotic Letter] (Kristin DE TROYER, Gabriella MESSERI, R.P., D.M., Angiolo MENCHETTI). - Essays [6 contributions, none of papyrological interest].
bibl.seg: MINUTOLI Diletta and Rosario PINTAUDI (Edd.), Papyri Graecae Schøyen (PSchøyen II). Essays and Texts in Honour of Martin Schøyen. With an Introduction by James M. ROBINSON. (Manuscripts in the Schøyen Collection. V. Greek Papyri. Volume II = Papyrologica Florentina. XL.)
Firenze, Gonnelli, 2010, 4°, xii-279 pp., 1 front. coul., figg. et 22 pll. coul. ISBN 978-88-7468-032-0. €200.

P. Schøyen II, 26-34. - Pp. ix: Prefazione (D.M. e R.P.); - xi: Introduction (J.M.R.). - Texts [26: Leviticus; - 27-33: Greek Documents; - 34: Demotic Letter] (Kristin DE TROYER, Gabriella MESSERI, R.P., D.M., Angiolo MENCHETTI). - Essays [6 contributions, none of papyrological interest].
Minutoli Pintaudi Robinson De Troyer Messeri Menchetti
